title: Always & Forever
description: Jon Burton thinks he's having a nightmare but the bad dreams don't fade when he's awake.Callie, his girlfriend, mother of his son Oliver, has been killed in a road accident.Now he faces life as a single parent.He's at school taking his A levels.He wants to go to Uni.His mother has her own life and career.His sister, Fay, older and wiser perhaps' advises him to have the baby adopted. Get on with his life.He should do that.Callie doesnâ€™t want him to do that. Only her body is dead. Her spirit is still alive. And she wants Jon, Oliver, and her to stay together.Always & Forever.
